thread.title: Greece's outspoken Varoufakis launches new party

title: Greece's outspoken Varoufakis launches new party
text:
Greece's outspoken Varoufakis launches new party Monday, March 26, 2018 - 01:05 
Greece's charismatic Yanis Varoufakis - known for his biker's jacket and outspoken tongue - has launched a new party to try to free his country from debt bondage. The former finance minister's party is called the European Realist Disobedience Front. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Greece's charismatic Yanis Varoufakis - known for his biker's jacket and outspoken tongue - has launched a new party to try to free his country from debt bondage. The former finance minister's party is called the European Realist Disobedience Front.
